title: The Service Course helps cycling pros give back with limited-edition threads
content:
It’s one thing to look and feel great in a cycling kit. It’s something else, and even better, when that kit is doing something more than wicking sweat and cutting through the air. European bike shop The Service Course has partnered with professional cyclists Mike Woods and Esteban Chaves to create a limited-edition run of […]

The post The Service Course helps cycling pros give back with limited-edition threads appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Mark Wilson
